QuestData.Title: Riverbeast Training: The Garn
QuestData.Description: The last test for your mount will pit it against one of the great terrors of this land.$B$BThe garn. Wolves as black as night, and twice the size of a normal wolf, they can tear an orc apart in mere moments. The beasts here wisely fear them.$B$BThere is a lone garn that calls Nagrand its home. Take your riverbeast, mount up, and bring it down. If the two of you survive, your riverbeast will truly be ready.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Maimclaw while riding your Riverbeast-In-Training.
